TopicTitle: First rocket I made on my new laptop.

Articles.Content:
Made this rocket on my new laptop after installing KSP.

Made it mainly to put the laptop through its pases. 30Fps, not bad.

http://www./?phl6049x8i3h6jt

2.4Ghz i3

6Gb DDR3 RAM

1GB Intel HD graphics

1366*768
Wait. Intel integrated GPU with 1GB VRAM? Or is it dynamically allocated?

Nice one Asm! I\'d wonder how well it flys. Better than the Yogcast too.

It works on an Intel Chip as well? Wow, they must have upgraded from those DOS drivers they kept spamming out. (Oh, but great specs on the laptop!)

the new Core i3, i5 and i7 chips actually have decent GPUs built in, and they do indeed have 1GB of allocated ram just for them.

Still not as good as even a midrange Nvidia or ATI GPU, but quite serviceable.

the new Core i3, i5 and i7 chips actually have decent GPUs built in, and they do indeed have 1GB of allocated ram just for them.

Still not as good as even a midrange Nvidia or ATI GPU, but quite serviceable.

Have you seen the Ivy Bridges? Intel is really stepping up their on die GPUs.

Probably because AMD\'s Llano APU was such a success. Even though the FX CPUs (Bulldozers) were awful.

I\'d wonder how well it flys.

I\'ve had a shitty day so when I unpacked my laptop and built this rocket, I full was alcohol, and I still kinad am, so naturally I do not fly well in the air space vacuum.

Because I\'m nice and inebriated I\'ma give you the .craft.

http://www./?phl6049x8i3h6jt
